tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    project_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE initiatives (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    initiative_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE stakeholders (
    stakeholder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stakeholder_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    due_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    progress_status VARCHAR(50),
    date_updated DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES tasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    completion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    project_id INT,
    deadline DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE TeamMembers (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR(100),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE ProgressUpdates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    update_description TEXT,
    task_id INT,
    progress_status VARCHAR(50),
    update_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Budget (
    budget_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    total_budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
    actual_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    remaining_budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
